org.sbml.squeezer.gui
Class GUITools

java.lang.Object
  org.sbml.squeezer.gui.GUITools

public class GUITools
extends Object

A convenient class that provides several handy methods for working with graphical user interfaces. It loads all icons that are required by the GUI and provides methods for changing color and state of GUI elements.

Since:
1.2.2
Author:
Andreas Dräger andreas.draeger@uni-tuebingen.de, Hannes Borch

createJFileChooser

public static JFileChooser createJFileChooser(String dir,
                                              boolean allFilesAcceptable,
                                              boolean multiSelectionAllowed,
                                              int mode,
                                              FileFilter... filter)
Creates and sets up a JFileFilter.

Parameters:
dir - Start directory
allFilesAcceptable - if true, all files are available besides the file filters
multiSelectionAllowed - if true more the one file can be selected.
mode - one of the Options in JFileChooser
filter - no, one or several file filters.
Returns:
Returns a file filter with the desired properties.

Shows a dialog that asks whether or not to overwrite an existing file and returns the answer from JOptionPane constants.

Parameters:
parent -
out -
Returns:
An integer representing the user's choice.
